headline: AmEx Set to Report Q4 Earnings: Key Metrics Investors Should Track
summary: AXP readies Q4 earnings with EPS seen up 16.8% as network volumes, discount revenues and card growth offset rising engagement costs.

headline: Dave Ramsey Calls Credit Cards ‘Financial Cigarettes’, and He Has A Point
summary: Dave Ramsey, the personal finance radio host and author, has long compared credit cards to cigarettes, calling them “the cigarette of the financial world” in his 2003 book The Total Money Makeover. His argument: both products are socially acceptable, heavily marketed, and financially destructive over time. With Americans now carrying $1.233 trillion in credit card ... Dave Ramsey Calls Credit Cards ‘Financial Cigarettes’, and He Has A Point

headline: Visa, Mastercard, AmEx earnings: Trump's cap idea 'won't stick'
summary: Credit card companies, like Visa (V), Mastercard (MA), and American Express (AXP), are reporting quarterly earnings results this week.The earnings reports come as President Trump proposes a 10% cap on credit card interest rates. JPMorgan (JPM) CEO Jamie Dimon said this policy would create an "economic disaster."B. Riley Wealth chief market strategist, Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma, and Yahoo Finance Senior Business Reporter Ines Ferré join Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to discuss their expectations.To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.
